In a way  by having more delivery folks signing up  LLM is also diversifying the number of delivery folks who can take up jobs when others canâ€™t make it - from motivation (or lack thereof)  weather  personal schedules etcCanâ€™t rely on it as a fulltime thingie.When SMM was in full force  people would probably rather send us to pick up and deliver food. Gut feel is that now those who should be at the workplace arenâ€™t ordering like before - and might just makan with friends/colleagues or tarbao together.Personally I rather send items but not food.But for homeowners who need a vehicle to move stuff  that demand will be there - just a matter of how many of them.Iâ€™ve enjoyed running a LLM job for a hearing aids company that a friend also works at - because I felt that I was earning while being a force multiplier for their business. Win-win  so they say. ğŸ™‚However this is an important time to really do the math  especially for 4 wheeled drivers. Because for motorbikes  the worst fuel consumption comes at about 15-20 kmpl.
